Keywords: Asgardian , Avengers , Cabal , Deity , Mystical , Ruler , Warrior
Real Name: Thor Odinson/Loki Laufeyson
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Destroy Blocking
TARGETING: Elevated, Hindering
AFTER YOU, BROTHER: Impervious. Thor and Loki has Cosmic Energy team ability. // At the beginning of your turn, you may choose a bystander on this card. If you do, Thor and Loki can use that character's standard powers until you choose again.
I BRING THE HAMMER, YOU BRING THE GLAMOUR: Sidestep, Mind Control.
SWINGING A HAMMER DOESN'T SOLVE EVERYTHING...BUT IS QUITE HANDY: Energy Explosion, Incapacitate. // If Thor and Loki hit all targets of an attack, this turn, Thor and Loki has "FREE: Make an attack."
GET BEHIND ME YOU BIG OAF: Super Senses. // Barrier as FREE, but only to generate 1 marker.
NO MORE RUNNING, BROTHER: Outwit. When Thor and Loki use it, after resolutions you may heal 1 click. // When Thor and Loki are KO'd, after resolutions you may generate a Thor bystander and a Loki bystander adjacent to the square they last occupied. Protected: Outwit, Pulse Wave.
